nodes.excerpt: SwiftCV helps you to build a beautifully designed page for your online professional presence. Make it easy for your visitors to find everything about you in one place. Use code PRODHUNT to get 20% off exclusively For suggestions reach us at hello@swiftcv.com

localize.tagline: 你唯一需要的专业资料。

nodes.excerpt: Plot combines your calendar, health and finances to give you a personalized overview of your life so you can manage what’s important. By integrating with your Apple Calendar and Health apps with your finances, Plot pulls-in and organizes your information.
nodes.title: Plot 2.0 - a calendar, health and personal finance app all in one
nodes.author: Cory McHattie

localize.description: Plot结合了你的日历、健康和财务，给你一个个性化的生活概览，让你可以管理重要的事情。通过整合你的Apple日历和健康应用程序与你的财务状况，Plot将你的信息拉进并组织起来。
localize.tagline: 一款集日历、健康和个人理财于一身的应用。

localize.description: Plot結合了你的日曆、健康和財務，給你一個個性化的生活概覽，讓你可以管理重要的事情。通過整合你的Apple日曆和健康應用程序與你的財務狀況，Plot將你的信息拉進並組織起來。
localize.tagline: 一款集日曆、健康和個人理財於一身的應用。

nodes.excerpt: ❤️ Open source 🤖 Native 🔌 Plugin system ⌨️ Custom hotkeys ⬆️ Sort options by frequency of use 📦 Small size (less than 20mb) Spotter is a productivity tool, the main function is to search and launch applications actions and applications themselves.
nodes.title: Spotter - Productivity tool that allows you to launch everything
nodes.author: Denis

localize.description: ❤️开源 🤖原生 🔌插件系统 ⌨️自定义热键 ⬆️按使用频率排序选项 📦体积小(小于20mb)Spotter是一个生产力工具，主要功能是搜索和启动应用的动作和应用本身。
localize.tagline: 生产力工具，允许你启动一切

localize.description: ❤️開源 🤖原生 🔌插件系統 ⌨️自定義熱鍵 ⬆️按使用頻率排序選項 📦體積小(小於20mb)Spotter是一個生產力工具，主要功能是搜索和啓動應用的動作和應用本身。
localize.tagline: 生產力工具，允許你啓動一切

nodes.excerpt: Figma Comments allows you to view and add new comments right from your phone. All you have to do is connect your Figma account and select the files you need. And as your teammates reply, you will see the new comments on the app, in real-time!
nodes.title: Figma Comments on Mobile - View and add comments on Figma using your mobile device.
nodes.author: Sahil Dave

localize.description: Figma Comments允许你在手机上直接查看和添加新的评论。您所要做的就是连接您的 Figma 帐户并选择您需要的文件。当你的队友回复时，你将会在应用程序上看到新的评论，而且是实时的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移动设备在Figma上查看和添加评论。

localize.description: Figma Comments允許你在手機上直接查看和添加新的評論。您所要做的就是連接您的 Figma 帳戶並選擇您需要的文件。當你的隊友回覆時，你將會在應用程序上看到新的評論，而且是實時的。
localize.tagline: 使用您的移動設備在Figma上查看和添加評論。

nodes.excerpt: 🚀 Codekeep lets you store and share bits of code and text with other users. Snippets can be organized into folders/labels for instant reuse. Create code screenshots and link it with codekeep.
nodes.title: CodeKeep - Organize, discover & share code snippets
nodes.author: JP1016

localize.description: 🚀 Codekeep 可以让你存储并与其他用户分享代码和文本片段。可以将代码片段组织到文件夹/标签中，以便即时重复使用。创建代码截图，并与codekeep链接。
localize.tagline: 组织、发现和共享代码片段

localize.description: 🚀 Codekeep 可以讓你存儲並與其他用戶分享代碼和文本片段。可以將代碼片段組織到文件夾/標籤中，以便即時重複使用。創建代碼截圖，並與codekeep鏈接。
localize.tagline: 組織、發現和共享代碼片段

nodes.excerpt: 🤔 Are you tired of constantly switching between your work apps on your browser/desktop? 😎 Hubblu is a distraction-free workspace having all your work apps in 1-place 🤑 Increase your productivity and save up to 40% more time cutting down on distractions
nodes.title: Hubblu - Distraction Free Workspace | All your Work Apps in 1-Place
nodes.author: Saimohit Sai

localize.description: 🤔 您是否厌倦了在浏览器/桌面上不断切换工作应用程序？😎 Hubblu是一个无干扰的工作空间，将您所有的工作应用程序集中在一个地方 🤑 提高您的生产力，并节省多达40％以上的时间，减少分心。
localize.tagline: 无干扰的工作空间｜所有的工作应用都在一个地方。

localize.description: 🤔 您是否厭倦了在瀏覽器/桌面上不斷切換工作應用程序？😎 Hubblu是一個無干擾的工作空間，將您所有的工作應用程序集中在一個地方 🤑 提高您的生產力，並節省多達40％以上的時間，減少分心。
localize.tagline: 無干擾的工作空間｜所有的工作應用都在一個地方。

nodes.excerpt: Smooth Hand Mockup helps you showcase your apps and services properly with animated hand mockups. It is designed to make your videos self-explanatory and engaging.
nodes.title: Smooth Hand Mockups - Create animated hand mockups and gestures for all devices
nodes.author: Ismail Mesbah

localize.description: Smooth Hand Mockup可以帮助您通过动画手部模拟来正确展示您的应用程序和服务。它的设计是为了让你的视频自明和吸引人。

localize.tagline: 爲所有設備創建動畫手勢模擬和手勢。

nodes.excerpt: Sprouter’s mission is to connect people and share life’s best moments faster than ever before while not only enhancing your overall social media experience, but the ecosystem of social media itself.
nodes.title: Sprouter - Sprouter is the fastest way to share your social medias
nodes.author: Tyler Peterson

localize.description: Sprouter的使命是比以往任何时候都更快地连接人们并分享生活中最美好的时刻，同时不仅提升你的整体社交媒体体验，而且提升社交媒体本身的生态系统。
localize.tagline: Sprouter是分享你的社交媒体的最快方式。

localize.description: Sprouter的使命是比以往任何時候都更快地連接人們並分享生活中最美好的時刻，同時不僅提升你的整體社交媒體體驗，而且提升社交媒體本身的生態系統。

nodes.excerpt: qr.eletto.dev is a simple QR code generator for developers. It can be used in any project to quickly generate QR codes. Instead of installing libraries into your project to generate QR codes, you can just use the URL as an image.
nodes.title: QR Code Generator For Developers - A quick API to generate QR codes in your apps
nodes.author: JohnAnthony Eletto

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一个简单的二维码生成器，适用于开发者。它可以用于任何项目中快速生成二维码。不需要在你的项目中安装库来生成二维码，你只需要使用URL作为图像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的应用程序中生成QR码的快速API。

localize.description: qr.eletto.dev是一個簡單的二維碼生成器，適用於開發者。它可以用於任何項目中快速生成二維碼。不需要在你的項目中安裝庫來生成二維碼，你只需要使用URL作爲圖像即可。
localize.tagline: 在您的應用程序中生成QR碼的快速API。

nodes.excerpt: Get the incredibly detailed and most accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch. The library is loaded with hundreds of components, colors, and text styles. Arguably the fastest way to get started with your Mac app designs.
nodes.title: macOS 11 Big Sur UI Kit - The most detailed and accurate macOS UI Kit for Sketch 💎
nodes.author: Alexander Käßner

localize.description: 为Sketch获得令人难以置信的详细和最准确的macOS UI Kit。该库加载了数百种组件、颜色和文本样式。可以说是最快的方式来开始你的Mac应用设计。
localize.tagline: 最详细、最准确的macOS用户界面工具包，适用于Sketch💎。

localize.description: 爲Sketch獲得令人難以置信的詳細和最準確的macOS UI Kit。該庫加載了數百種組件、顏色和文本樣式。可以說是最快的方式來開始你的Mac應用設計。
localize.tagline: 最詳細、最準確的macOS用戶界面工具包，適用於Sketch💎。

nodes.excerpt: Organize all the docs in a way where people can find them. Spaceli allows you to create a knowledge base from your existing Google Docs and folders in a couple of clicks. For you, your team and your users.
nodes.title: Spaceli - Turn Google Docs into a knowledge base
nodes.author: Yaroslav Dunaev

localize.description: 将所有的文档整理成人们可以找到的方式。Spaceli允许您从现有的谷歌文档和文件夹中创建一个知识库，只需点击几下。对于你，你的团队和你的用户来说。
localize.tagline: Verwandeln Sie Google Docs in eine Wissensdatenbank

localize.description: 將所有的文檔整理成人們可以找到的方式。Spaceli允許您從現有的谷歌文檔和文件夾中創建一個知識庫，只需點擊幾下。對於你，你的團隊和你的用戶來說。

nodes.excerpt: Internal’s new enterprise-ready app builder includes a flexible drag-and-drop UI to build tools, powerful dev tools to connect to any API, and robust security options including permissioned data flows and SOC 2 certified cloud or on-premise hosting.
nodes.title: Internal Enterprise - Build enterprise-ready internal tools, fast.
nodes.author: Oscar Godson

localize.description: Internal新的企业级应用构建器包括一个灵活的拖放式UI以构建工具，强大的开发工具以连接到任何API，以及强大的安全选项，包括许可的数据流和SOC 2认证的云或内部托管。
localize.tagline: 快速构建企业就绪的内部工具。

localize.description: Internal新的企業級應用構建器包括一個靈活的拖放式UI以構建工具，強大的開發工具以連接到任何API，以及強大的安全選項，包括許可的數據流和SOC 2認證的雲或內部託管。

nodes.excerpt: FundedList is the best way to connect with hundreds of recently funded startup founders every week. The weekly reports contains verified emails, LinkedIn profiles, startup information, and funding data so you can send personalized outreach in seconds.
nodes.title: FundedList - Weekly report of newly funded founders with verified emails
nodes.author: Sean Graham

localize.description: FundedList是每周与数百名最近获得资金的创业者建立联系的最佳方式。周报中包含经过验证的电子邮件、LinkedIn简介、创业者信息和资金数据，因此你可以在几秒钟内发送个性化的宣传。
localize.tagline: 新资助的创始人的每周报告，并有核实的电子邮件。

localize.description: FundedList是每週與數百名最近獲得資金的創業者建立聯繫的最佳方式。週報中包含經過驗證的電子郵件、LinkedIn簡介、創業者信息和資金數據，因此你可以在幾秒鐘內發送個性化的宣傳。
localize.tagline: 新資助的創始人的每週報告，並有覈實的電子郵件。

nodes.excerpt: Hacker Memo is a simple memo app that pursues "coolness". The design is based on the image of science fiction and spy movies such as "The Matrix" and "007".
nodes.title: HackerMemo -  The coolest memo app for sci-fi lovers
nodes.author: YuKiO | 個人開発&Flutter

localize.description: 黑客备忘录是一款追求 "酷 "的简单备忘录应用。设计以《黑客帝国》、《007》等科幻、谍战电影的形象为基础。
localize.tagline: 最酷的备忘录应用，适合科幻爱好者使用。

localize.tagline: 最酷的備忘錄應用，適合科幻愛好者使用。

nodes.excerpt: eProduct is and evidence-based product management software to hep you build customer driven products based on market evidence, reach market fit quicker and drive revenue. single platform to UNDERSTAND, MANAGE & LAUNCH products users need.

nodes.excerpt: Signils has the best UI design and UX of any Bluetooth management or device locator app. Power uses can manage more devices with our images, two-column display and filters Manage devices (Bluetooth or Beacons) and selectively locate a specific a device.

nodes.author: Steve Smith

localize.description: Signils拥有所有蓝牙管理或设备定位应用中最好的UI设计和用户体验。使用我们的图像、双栏显示和过滤器，可以管理更多的设备。 管理设备（蓝牙或信标），并有选择地定位特定的设备。

nodes.excerpt: Afino is a web-based app that makes it easy for managers and leaders to keep their team connected, engaged, and productive. With Afino, you can quickly and easily set up fun team events, track important metrics, and find ways to boost team health.
nodes.title: Afino - Build a great culture for your team, from anywhere.
nodes.author: James Quinn

localize.description: Afino是一款基于网络的应用程序，它可以让管理者和领导者轻松地保持团队的联系、参与和生产力。有了Afino，你可以快速、轻松地设置有趣的团队活动，跟踪重要的指标，并找到促进团队健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 从任何地方为您的团队建立一个良好的文化。

localize.description: Afino是一款基於網絡的應用程序，它可以讓管理者和領導者輕鬆地保持團隊的聯繫、參與和生產力。有了Afino，你可以快速、輕鬆地設置有趣的團隊活動，跟蹤重要的指標，並找到促進團隊健康的方法。
localize.tagline: 從任何地方爲您的團隊建立一個良好的文化。

nodes.excerpt: Bring documents from everyday life into a collaborative environment built for teams. Video chat, edit files, and work together with your team on an endless canvas.

nodes.excerpt: Soundescape is a free web application for ambient background sounds. If you struggle to concentrate while working from home, this tool is for you! Audio is rendered in 3D, and you'll never hear the exact same combination of audio twice, as everything is generated randomly.
nodes.title: Soundescape - Generative 3D audio environments for focused work
nodes.author: Maximilian Torggler

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免费的环境背景音网络应用。如果你在家工作时难以集中精力，这个工具就是为你准备的。音频是以3D形式呈现的，你永远不会听到两次完全相同的音频组合，因为一切都是随机生成的。
localize.tagline: 专注工作的生成式3D音频环境

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免費的環境背景音網絡應用。如果你在家工作時難以集中精力，這個工具就是爲你準備的。音頻是以3D形式呈現的，你永遠不會聽到兩次完全相同的音頻組合，因爲一切都是隨機生成的。
localize.tagline: 專注工作的生成式3D音頻環境

nodes.excerpt: Backlink Tool will help you index your url links and send it to Google safely and securely for free. No need to use illegal and black hat methods. Here we use a method that is in accordance with the SEO and white hat method.
nodes.title: Backlink Tool - A backlink tool to index your links quickly and freely.
nodes.author: Bhawani Garg

localize.description: Backlink Tool将帮助您索引您的网址链接，并将其发送到谷歌安全可靠的免费。不需要使用非法和黑帽的方法。在这里，我们使用的方法是符合SEO和白帽的方法。
localize.tagline: 一个快速、自由地索引你的链接的反向链接工具。

nodes.excerpt: Give a kick-Start to New Year 🎉 with our "Resolution board 2021” Notion Templates. With 4 Generic Starter Templates For - Your Reading List 📚 - Vacation plans ✈️ - Fitness 🏃🏻‍♂️ - Content Planner 📝 And a Bonus Template too 🏆 So, Get it now!
nodes.title: Resolution Board - Notion template to manage all your 2021 goals
nodes.author: Sarthak Sharma
